summary: Held in Auburn, California, The Quest! Adventure Run is a high-concept, fantasy-themed trail race that transforms the rugged Sierra Nevada foothills into an immersive role-playing game (RPG). Runners choose character classes and navigate technical trails while completing interactive challenges, blending traditional endurance with strategic gameplay.
uniqueFeatures: RPG Class System: Participants roll a 20-sided die (D20) to determine their character class—such as Wizard, Warrior, or Rogue—which grants them specific 'powers' and unique abilities to use during the race.

Interactive Side Quests: The course features up to 16 side quests that require runners to solve riddles, find hidden items like 'missing goblins,' or complete physical trials to earn time-reduction bonuses off their final score.

Mythical Boss Encounters: Runners must interact with live actors playing fantasy 'bosses'—including a Dragon, Fairy, and Wizard—who guard checkpoints and offer challenges that must be overcome to progress in the quest.

media.title: Quest For the Crest: Beauty Comes at a Price
media.summary: An editorial race profile of the 'Quest for the Crest' ultramarathon, highlighting its reputation as one of the most technical 50Ks in the U.S. and its route to the summit of Mt. Mitchell.
